title.@value: Acquired immunodeficiency due to loss of immunoglobulin

definition.@value: Acquired immunodeficiency due to loss of immunoglobulins (protein loss) may occur via the GI tract (protein losing enteropathy), via the kidney (nephrotic syndrome) or via the skin (in severe skin damage).

label.@value: Acquired immunodeficiency due to loss of immunoglobulin
Acquired immunodeficiency due to protein loss
